clients.native:
package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"net/http"
	"io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

	url := "https://localhost:3000/1/dummy"

	req, _ := http.NewRequest("GET", url, nil)

	res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

	defer res.Body.Close()
	body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

	fmt.Println(res)
	fmt.Println(string(body))

}

clients.okhttp:
val client = OkHttpClient()

val request = Request.Builder()
  .url("https://localhost:3000/1/dummy")
  .get()
  .build()

val response = client.newCall(request).execute()

clients.cohttp:
open Cohttp_lwt_unix
open Cohttp
open Lwt

let uri = Uri.of_string "https://localhost:3000/1/dummy" in

Client.call `GET uri
>>= fun (res, body_stream) ->
  (* Do stuff with the result *)

clients.curl:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_PORT => "3000",
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://localhost:3000/1/dummy",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "GET",
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_PORT => "3000",
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://localhost:3000/1/dummy",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "GET",
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

clients.http1:
<?php

$request = new HttpRequest();
$request->setUrl('https://localhost:3000/1/dummy');
$request->setMethod(HTTP_METH_GET);

try {
  $response = $request->send();

  echo $response->getBody();
} catch (HttpException $ex) {
  echo $ex;
}

clients.python3:
import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("localhost:3000")

conn.request("GET", "/1/dummy")

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

clients.requests:
import requests

url = "https://localhost:3000/1/dummy"

response = requests.request("GET", url)

print(response.text)

clients.httr:
library(httr)

url <- "https://localhost:3000/1/dummy"

response <- VERB("GET", url, content_type("application/octet-stream"))

content(response, "text")

clients.native:
require 'uri'
require 'net/http'
require 'openssl'

url = URI("https://localhost:3000/1/dummy")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Get.new(url)

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body
